descriptions.index: Stable, anonymous, user-friendy zcash pool with great user interface. 1.5 hours PPLNS, 1% commission, regular payouts, min payout 0.01 ZEC
descriptions.account: Account statistics. Check your hashrate, balance, payments.
descriptions.stats: Pool and network statistics. Check charts of pool hashrate, mining difficulty and block time.
descriptions.help: Help page. Guides, usefull links, pool settings.
descriptions.faq: FAQ page. Answers to most frequently asked questions.
descriptions.worker: Worker statistics. Check hashrate, balance, payments for your worker.
descriptions.api: API documentation. The API is free to use.
descriptions.blocks: All found blocks with exact reward.

title: Nanopool | ZCash | Account
